title: Fundamentals of Programming
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of programming. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Principles of Web Development
description: Comprehensive study of web development with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Intermediate Machine Learning
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of machine learning. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Applied Algorithms
description: Comprehensive study of algorithms with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Software Engineering
description: Rigorous treatment of software engineering theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Advanced Computer Graphics
description: Advanced exploration of computer graphics covering current research and industry practices.

title: Advanced Data Structures
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of data structures. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Special Topics in Web Development
description: Interdisciplinary approach to web development combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: POLI 317 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Artificial Intelligence
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in artificial intelligence. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.
prerequisites: POLI 382 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Computer Graphics
description: Rigorous treatment of computer graphics theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: POLI 361 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Software Engineering
description: Advanced exploration of software engineering covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: POLI 346 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Data Structures
description: Interdisciplinary approach to data structures combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: POLI 316 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Algorithms
description: Rigorous treatment of algorithms theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: POLI 306 and senior standing or graduate status
